title: Where exactly do I go to give alpha client feedback?

replies.body: There is a section in the alpha client that should auto-direct you to your web browser to submit feedback.  You can also just go to the[ alpha boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work) to provide it!  Happy testing!
